Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing schoolchildren to carry cellular phones to and from school.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing schoolchildren to carry cellular phones to and from school for safety purposes.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 351-A, in relation to allowing schoolchildren to carry cellular phones to and from school.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto of Int. No. 351-A - Allowing schoolchildren to carry cellular phones to and from school for safety purposes.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing schoolchildren to carry cellular phones to and from school.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Allowing schoolchildren to carry cellular phones to and from school for safety purposes.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 351-A, in relation to allowing schoolchildren to carry cellular phones to and from school.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be Filed by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto of Int. No. 351-A - Allowing schoolchildren to carry cellular phones to and from school for safety purposes.
